title: MacBeth: a tragedy
brief_description:
Double, double, toil and trouble;
Macbeth’s re-born and here come’s trouble!
You’ll see the world through his own eyes,
You’ll meet his horse,
You’ll laugh, you’ll cry.
And somewhere along the way,
I hope that you’ll enjoy this play!

Welcome to the 21st Century where anything is possible as the past collides with the present and Macbeth finds himself resurrected at the Sydney Gay and Lesbian Mardi Gras. In this interactive comic satire of William Shakespeare’s Macbeth, you must help Macbeth on his adventurous journey as he attempts to find his horse. Will
Macbeth succeed in his quest? It’s up to you to find out!

After experiencing the magical world of the Mardi Gras, learn the art of insults by playing the Shakespearean Insults Quiz. Are you an ‘idol of idiot worshippers’ or will you be successful in solving the quiz and apprehending the Bard? Try this quiz and see for yourself!
